Container.Name: DiscoLoader
Container.Overview:
Discordbot for JDownloader
Current Features: Slashcommand integration Adding Links Query Status of Downloads
Information: After the first start of the docker, please navigate to your appdata folder and edit the settingsfile of the bot.
